title: Types of AI (Narrow, General, Super AI)
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Classification based on capability:
1. **Narrow AI (ANI)**: Good at one specific task (Chess, Face ID). All current AI is ANI.
2. **General AI (AGI)**: Human-level intelligence across any domain. (Hypothetical).
3. **Super AI (ASI)**: Surpasses human intelligence. (Sci-Fi).

examples.code:
Siri: Narrow AI (Can't tie shoes).
Data (Star Trek): General AI.

common_mistakes.correction: ChatGPT is highly advanced Narrow AI (Language prediction). It doesn't 'know' things or have consciousness.
